press_button.description: Press the button to start the coffee machine.

press_inaccessible_button.description: In case the button is inaccessible, apply pressure on the coffee machine body.

clean_coffee_machine_button.description: Clean the button of the coffee machine to ensure it works properly.

clean_coffee_machine_body.description: Clean the body of the coffee machine to maintain it clean and glossy.

clean_whole_coffee_machine.description: Clean the entire coffee machine including the body and button.
